hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents one minute.

$4{:}42$ is $42$ minutes after $4{:}00$. 


[[☃ image 1]]

So, we move $42$ tick marks past $4{:}00$.

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 4:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 5:00.  The second tick mark after 40 is labeled 4:42. A green line moves right along the number line from 4:00 to 4:42. !

hints.content:
This number line shows $4{:}42$ graphed:


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 4:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 5:00.  The second tick mark after 40 is labeled C. !

question.content:
**On which number line is $4{:}42$ graphed?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 4:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 5:00. The fourth tick mark after 40 is labeled A. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/15bb8bafede32f68a1c779ef008a1cbadd7b422b)

![A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 5:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 6:00. The fourth tick mark after 40 is labeled B.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/68beffb7352ad5f7b4fbf17e5b769677eb2f4ed3)

![A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 4:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 5:00. The second tick mark after 40 is labeled C.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b72708bbe8dadf87445a59a169d6e9d1280c1e44)
